hero.description: Decentralized storage on {network} with global delivery via Cloudflare.

ultraFast.title: Ultra-fast upload
ultraFast.description: Scalable pool of up to 50,000 wallets working in parallel to upload your files in record time.

globalDelivery.title: Instant global delivery
globalDelivery.description: Cloudflare CDN for ultra-fast delivery anywhere in the world. Automatic caching after the first request.

secureBlockchain.title: Secure blockchain
secureBlockchain.description: Data stored immutably on Arkiv Network with complete cryptographic verification.
